alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 2:23AM MST until March 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers developing this morning and slowly increasing through the afternoon. A period of very heavy snow will develop late this afternoon and evening, slowly decreasing into early Thursday morning. Southwest winds from 15 to 25 mph with gusts from 35 to 45 mph, will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. Winds will decrease Wednesday night. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 8 AM Today to 8 AM Thursday: Forest Lakes 16 to 22 inches Heber-Overgaard 6 to 10 inches Payson 6 to 10 inches Pine-Strawberry 12 to 18 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
